Level Seven
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Seven
By Y.K.TAN on Monday, July 16, 2001 - 02:55 am:

STAGE 7


Move right once when you first start. Jump and destroy the wooden box on your right. Take the golden medal,and move right two steps,and your path will be block by a wooden box,and on top the wooden box will be a Jell,destroy the wooden box and the jell will fall to it's death. Move right once,and create a box there. Than jump on that box.Face left and create a box,and stand on it. Move left twice,jump and destroy the first lower box,and you will get a firework. Create boxes up,and take the bell,than the suzurin will come. Move right,and destroy the lower box and you can get another firework. After that,go back to where the Jell was. Now move right,and destroy the box,and you can see a ducken there. Grab the golden key,and beware of the sudden attacks from the ducken. Than be as quick as lightning,and destroy the box and get down. If you are not quick enough,dodge the duecken's attack and hit the ducken with a firework. Once you are down there, wait until the Joker's far away from you,than dash and go through the door,AND THERE YOU WIN STAGE 7. GOOD LUCK TO YOU ALL.
